ingredient-information.sestavine: AQUA, GLYCERIN, ETHYLHEXYL STEARATE, GYLCERYL STEARATE,PRUNUS AMYGDALUS DULCIS OIL, BEHENYL ALCOHOL, STEARYL ALCOHOL,BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII BUTTER, SODIUM CETEARYL SULFATE, PRUNUS CERASUSEXTRACT, PAEONIA OFFICINALIS FLOWER EXTRACT, PARFUM, SODIUM BENZOATE,POTASSIUM SORBATE, XANTHAN GUM, ALLANTOIN, LECITHIN, CITRIC ACID, LIMONENE,TOCOPHEROL, ASCORBYL PALMITATE, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL.

product-info.opis: Odišavljena krema, ki se hitro vpija in neguje vaše roke, da postanejo žametno mehke. Dermatološko preizkušeno.
